title: An Interview with Douglas McLean

abstract: Douglas McLean speaks about his service in the army and fighting the Japanese in the Pacific during World War II.
description: Douglas McLean tells of how he was called up when war was declared and his posting to the 39th Brigade. He covers his years of service as well as fighting the Japanese in the Pacific.
